name: tm05
effect: Teaches Roar to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Roar to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Mega Kick)

flavor_text.black-white: The target is scared off and replaced by another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The target is scared off and replaced by another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.
